channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: No rain in Delhi after cloud seeding trials. Why did the experiment flop?
How Japan’s new prime minister played the ‘Trump’ card
Can the US-brokered Gaza ceasefire survive Israel’s latest strikes on Hamas?
How online harassment has taken a toll on Brigitte Macron’s life
'Storm of the century’: Why Hurricane Melissa, heading towards Cuba after Jamaica, is so devastating
History Today: When bomb blasts at crowded markets, bus rocked Delhi 20 years ago
Between Trump and Xi: India’s strategic balancing in an uncertain global order
item.description: The erosion of global trust is forcing India to move from cautious optimism to strategic clarity in its foreign policy

item.title: For India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor to succeed, Delhi must invest more in Greece and Cyprus
item.description: If IMEEC is truly going to counter the Belt and Road Initiative, it must respond to the maritime advantages China has built over the last decade. Greece and Cyprus do that

item.title: L’affaire Francesca Orsini: Indians apparently still cannot speak without the helping hand of a Western scholar
item.description: There ought not to be a debate over Orsini’s deportation; that there was tells us how structures of knowledge production still perpetuate colonial power relations.

item.title: How Trump-Xi Apec meeting is final chance to prevent a renewed trade war
item.description: The Apec Gyeongju Summit offers a platform for direct, face-to-face dialogue between the two leaders, enabling them to move past lower-level disputes and engage in personal diplomacy

item.title: No longer a geopolitical blind spot: Rising significance of Western Indian Ocean
item.description: The Western Indian Ocean is where security, trade, and diplomacy intersect. India’s sustained engagement, naval exercises, and partnerships with African littoral states demonstrate a forward-looking maritime strategy

item.title: Kuala Lumpur Summit: A defining milestone for the Indo-Asean century
item.description: With Asean Vision 2045 and Viksit Bharat 2047 aligned, India and Asean have embarked on a shared journey of prosperity, resilience, and stability
